thread.title: Orlando Magic's dance troupe shows that swag has no age limit
thread.title_full: Orlando Magic's dance troupe shows that swag has no age limit

author: Hector Diaz
title: Orlando Magic's dance troupe shows that swag has no age limit
text:
They’ve got the moves. 
Yeah, the @OrlandoMagic way! #LetsGoMagic pic.twitter.com/W6R4sA7VBk 
— NBA (@NBA) March 9, 2017 Forget fancy on-court presentations before the start a game and or pyrotechnics of any kind. If you really want to dazzle basketball fans, the Orlando Magic know the winning combination: you start a dance troupe made up of older Floridians. 
Don’t let anyone tell you that swag has an age limit because they are absolutely rocking it. The Orlando Magic have the best dancers in the league and an air mascot that can apparently hop its way out of the court on its head . If you’re looking for a new favorite basketball team, the Orlando Magic might be it.
